body: Hey all, I have started to see alot of people making posts of QnA and AnA posts lately, so I would like to have one. I am guessing I have a few questions around, so feel free to question anything because I will answer it. Well, not much to say here than to ask away, thanks!
body_tagged: Hey all, I have started to see alot of people making posts of QnA and AnA posts lately, so I would like to have one. I am guessing I have a few questions around, so feel free to question anything because I will answer it. Well, not much to say here than to ask away, thanks!
title: QNA  |  Ezno_  |  Questions Needed!

replies.body:

2, What is your favorite Staff Member
3, What do you do except from MineCraft
4, What is your favorite moment on Avicus?
5, What is your permanent goal on Avicus?
